Task: Multi-Label Binary Classification for Medical Texts
Description: The task involves classifying detailed medical case descriptions into a multi-label binary classification target. Each target label corresponds to the presence (true) or absence (false) of predefined medical findings, conditions, or recommendations.

conditions.description: A list of binary labels where each position corresponds to a predefined medical finding or condition. 'true' indicates the presence of the finding, while 'false' indicates its absence.

text.description: The detailed text description of the patient's case, including symptoms, findings, and recommendations.
